config.title: Petzzu ©
config.description: Petzzu is a platform that allows you to create personalized pages for special people.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: We use cookies to ensure the best experience on our website. By continuing to browse, you agree to our Privacy Policy.

hero.description: Eternalize every memory, smiles, discoveries, and each new phase of your pet are unique moments that deserve to be recorded. Follow this beautiful journey and eternalize every detail with care.

input.placeholder: Ex: John & Mary or Happy Birthday or etc

how-work.subtitle: How does it work?
how-work.title: Create the page in 4 steps
how-work.description: Surprise someone special with a personalized page. It's easy and fast.

1.title: 1. Creation form

2.title: 2. Secure payment

3.title: 3. QR Code and link
3.description: You will receive a QR code and a link via email to access the personalized page.

title.3: to create, see an example page.

2.title: Netflix

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some frequently asked questions to help you better understand Petzzu. If you have any questions, please contact us.

1.question: What is Petzzu?
1.answer: Petzzu is a platform that allows you to create personalized pages for special people. You can add photos, a message, and also the time of the union.

2.question: How can I create a personalized page on Petzzu?
2.answer: To create your personalized page, follow the steps by filling out the form with the requested information. After filling it out, you will be directed to the payment.

3.question: What is included in my personalized page?
3.answer: Your personalized page will include everything you fill in the form, depending on the chosen plan.

4.question: How do I receive my personalized page after payment?
4.answer: After payment confirmation, you will receive a QR code and a link via email to share and access the page.

5.question: Does the personalized page have an expiration date?
5.answer: Yes, in the basic plan, the page will be available for 1 year. In the advanced plan, the page will be lifetime.

6.question: How long does it take to receive the QR Code by email?
6.answer: Payments with Credit Card & PIX are processed immediately.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.description: See what our customers are saying about Petzzu

1.name: Mariana
1.message: I loved creating my pet's timeline! I managed to record all the special moments with photos, videos, and messages. It turned out beautiful and emotional!

2.name: Ana
2.message: Petzzu helped me organize and eternalize each phase of my pet's growth. It's amazing to be able to relive each moment so easily!

3.name: Lucas
3.message: I set up my pet's timeline from birth and it turned out perfect! Now I have all the memories gathered in one place, in a special way.

4.name: Marcelo
4.message: The platform is super intuitive and easy to use! I created the timeline with the most memorable photos of my son and loved the result!

5.name: Bia and Henrique
5.message: It was emotional to create this digital record for our pet! It will surely be a valuable gift for him in the future. We are happy to have every detail stored with so much care!

6.name: Clara
6.message: Petzzu made it much easier to save and share my pet's special moments with the family. Everyone loved the idea!

7.name: Vanessa
7.message: I was enchanted by the possibility of creating an interactive record of my pet's growth. Every detail makes all the difference!

8.name: Bruno
8.message: Creating this timeline was one of the best decisions I made! Now I have a beautiful and organized record of all my little one's moments.

9.name: Larissa and Tiago
9.message: It was amazing to put together this timeline full of memories and special details. A gift for life! Being able to relive each stage together fills us with emotion.

cta.title: Get it now and eternalize moments!

1.title: First breath

content.introduction_description: Your privacy is extremely important to us. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when using our platform.
content.information_we_collect: We collect the following information when using our platform:
content.registration_info: • Registration Information: Name, pregnancy start date, birth date, personalized message, pregnancy photos, pet photos, and email address.
content.payment_info: • Payment Information: The email registered with Stripe or Pagar.me / Stone to process the payment and send the link to the personalized page.
content.use_payment_process: • Process the payment and send the link to the personalized page via email.
content.use_personalize_page: • Personalize and create the pregnancy page with the provided information.
content.use_improve_service: • Improve our services and customer support.
content.sharing_information: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except when necessary to process payments (Stripe and Pagar.me / Stone) or as required by law.
content.security_description: We adopt appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no data transmission over the internet is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
content.data_retention_description: We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, or as required by law.
content.your_rights_description: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, contact us at: contact@petzzu.com.
content.changes_to_policy_description: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. When we do, the "last updated" date at the top of this page will be changed. It is your responsibility to review this policy periodically to stay informed about possible changes.
content.contact_description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: contact@petzzu.com.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: By accessing and using our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the platform. Last updated: 09/01/2024

content.acceptance_description: By accessing and using our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the platform.
content.service_description: Petzzu offers a service that allows couples to create a personalized page by filling out a form with names, birth date, and pregnancy start date, a special message, and up to 4 media per category. After filling out the form, the couple is directed to the payment and, upon completion, receives a link with a QR Code sent by email.
content.registration_and_security: To use our services, you must provide a valid email address. We will not share your email with third parties.
content.privacy_policy: We value your privacy. Your data will not be processed or sold to third parties. The provided email will be used exclusively to send the link to your personalized page.
content.user_content: You are solely responsible for the content you enter on the platform, including photos, messages, and information about the pregnancy and pet. We are not responsible for inappropriate or illegal content uploaded by users.
content.payments_refund_policy: Payments are processed through Stripe and Pagar.me / Stone. After payment confirmation, the responsible party will receive a link to access the personalized page by email. Refunds are not offered, except in exceptional cases, at our sole discretion.
content.service_changes: We are committed to keeping the service available during the contracted period, according to the chosen plan (basic or advanced plan). However, in extraordinary situations, such as technical, legal, or financial issues, we reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service. In case of discontinuation, we will notify users in advance and seek to offer suitable alternatives whenever possible. Petzzu is not responsible for losses resulting from modifications or interruptions in extraordinary circumstances, but we will make efforts to minimize impacts.
content.limitation_of_liability: We will not be liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages related to the use or inability to use the platform.
content.terms_update: We may revise these Terms of Use periodically. When we do, we will update the "last updated" date at the top of this page. It is your responsibility to review the Terms of Use periodically to stay informed about possible changes.
content.contact: If you have any questions about the Terms of Use, please contact us at: contact@petzzu.com

pages.title: My Pages
pages.description: Here are all the personalized pages you have created. You can view, edit, or deactivate them.

edit.title: Edit Page
edit.description: Edit the information of the personalized page. You can change the title, message, start date, photos, music, background animation, and plan.
edit.images-attention: Attention: When changing the images, they are instantly reflected on the page.
edit.save-info: Attention: Go to the end of the steps and click save to confirm the changes.

unique.title: Basic Plan
unique.description: Basic plan with one-time payment, but has no edits and lasts 1 year.

month.title: Monthly
month.description: Monthly plan with monthly payment, has unlimited edits and lasts while the subscription is active.

annual.title: Annual
annual.description: Annual plan with annual payment, has unlimited edits while the subscription is active and lasts forever.
